ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ ENGLISH ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ : Ultra-light plugin to keep your pages and posts always up to date for our friend GG. Set up a monthly/weekly CRON task (or at the recurrence you want…) and set the maximum number of previous days that you want. The plugin will set as the last modification date of your post/page, a random date between the execution date of your CRON task and the maximum number of previous days that you have configured
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wpost-still-fresh directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Set yours preferences.

.::: EXPLICATIONS EN FRANCAIS :::.
